algorithm_technique: Convert the number to a string, iterate through digits, calculate power sum, and compare.
problem_summary_simple: Determine if a number is an Armstrong number (sum of its digits raised to the power of the number of digits equals the number itself).
problem_summary_technical: Convert the integer to a string to easily access digits and count them. Calculate the sum of each digit raised to the power of the total number of digits.
key_insights: Converting to a string simplifies digit extraction and counting.
The power is determined by the number of digits in the original number.
Directly calculating the sum and comparing is efficient.
